content: Yes, the short story I wrote about Meicha's first day of kindergarten is connected to the title "The First Day of School." Meicha is a child who is excited about starting kindergarten but also a little scared. She learns about the importance of trying new things and being brave throughout her first day at JCM. The story also highlights the joys of making new friends, learning new things, and being part of a community, which are key themes in the title. She also learn about the importance of her school environment that provides fun, nurturing environment for kids to learn and develop.
